content.question: Which of the following statements about short-run costs is true?

choices.label: Average fixed cost plus variable cost equals total cost.
Average total cost plus average fixed cost equals average variable cost.
Total fixed cost increases in constant increments as output produced increases.
Total fixed cost plus total variable cost equals total cost.
At low output levels, as output increases, total fixed cost and total variable cost decrease, reducing average total cost.

content.answer: Total fixed cost plus total variable cost equals total cost.
